content: Just a sidenote: If you ever tried to fit your brand, UI style guide into any OS specific guides that is a huge team effort— and also inspiring — to keep it consistent, make it easy-to-maintain from development side, and have your product/brand tone of voice. Btw you were highlighted great MD feat. branded UI examples: usually these companies do this kind of merging of visuals pretty well also on iOS. This is a great summary of the issues w/ MD, I’m glad that someone took their time, this will be prefect to explain and educate others, thanks!
